took famili zarhit brought famili zarhit man man zabdi wa taken 718 brought household man man achan son carmi son zabdi son zerah tribe judah wa taken 719 joshua said achan son give pray thee glori lord god israel make confess tell now hast done hide 720 achan answer joshua said inde sin lord god israel thu thu done 721 saw spoil goodli babylonish garment two hundr shekel silver wedg gold fifti shekel weight covet took behold are hid earth midst tent silver 722 joshua sent messeng ran tent behold wa hid tent silver 723 took midst tent brought joshua children israel laid lord 724 joshua israel took achan son zerah silver garment wedg gold son daughter oxen ass sheep tent had brought valley achor 725 joshua said hast troubl lord shall troubl thee day israel stone stone burn fire had stone stone 726 rais great heap stone day lord turn fierc anger name place wa call valley achor day 81 lord said joshua fear dismay take peopl war thee aris ai see given thi hand king ai peopl citi land 82 shalt ai king didst jericho king spoil thereof cattl thereof shall take prey lay thee ambush citi 83 joshua aros peopl war ai joshua chose thirti thousand mighti men valour sent night 84 command say behold shall lie wait citi even citi veri citi readi 85 peopl are will approach citi shall come pass come first will flee 86 will come drawn citi will say flee first will flee 87 shall rise ambush seiz citi lord god will deliv hand 88 shall taken citi shall set citi fire accord command lord shall see command 89 joshua sent forth went lie ambush abod bethel ai west side ai joshua lodg night peopl 810 joshua rose earli morn number peopl went elder israel peopl ai 811 peopl even peopl war were went drew nigh came citi pitch north side ai now wa valley ai 812 took five thousand men set lie ambush bethel ai west side citi 813 had set peopl even host wa north citi lier wait west citi joshua went night midst valley 814 came pass king ai saw hast rose earli men citi went israel battl peopl time appoint plain wist were lier ambush citi 815 joshua israel made were beaten fled way wilder 816 peopl were ai were call pursu pursu joshua were drawn citi 817 wa man left ai bethel went israel left citi open pursu israel 818 lord said joshua stretch spear is thi hand ai will give hand joshua stretch spear had hand citi 819 ambush aros quickli place ran soon had stretch hand enter citi took hast set citi fire 820 men ai look saw behold smoke citi ascend heaven had power flee way way peopl fled wilder turn pursuer 821 joshua israel saw ambush had taken citi smoke citi ascend turn again slew men ai 822 issu citi were midst israel side side smote let none remain escap 823 king ai took aliv brought joshua 824 came pass israel had made end slay inhabit ai field wilder wherein chase were fallen edg sword were consum israelit return ai smote edg sword 825 wa fell day men women were twelv thousand even men ai 826 joshua drew hand wherewith stretch spear had utterli destroy inhabit ai 827 cattl spoil citi israel took prey accord word lord command joshua 828 joshua burnt ai made heap even desol day 829 king ai hang tree eventid soon sun wa joshua command take carcas tree cast enter gate citi rais thereon great heap stone remaineth day 830 joshua built altar lord god israel mount ebal 831 mose servant lord command children israel is written book law mose altar whole stone man hath lift iron offer thereon burnt offer lord sacrif peac offer 832 wrote stone copi law mose wrote presenc children israel 833 israel elder offic judg stood side ark side priest levit bare ark coven lord stranger wa born mount gerizim mount ebal mose servant lord had command bless peopl israel 834 afterward read word law bless curs accord is written book law 835 wa word mose jerubba are threescor ten person reign reign rememb also am bone flesh 93 mother’ brethren spake ear men shechem word heart inclin follow abimelech said is brother 94 gave threescor ten piec silver hous baalberith wherewith abimelech hire vain light person follow 95 went father’ hous ophrah slew brethren son jerubba be threescor ten person stone jotham youngest son jerubba wa left hid 96 men shechem gather hous millo went made abimelech king plain pillar wa shechem 97 told jotham went stood top mount gerizim lift voic cri said hearken men shechem god may hearken 98 tree went forth time anoint king said oliv tree reign 99 oliv tree said leav fat wherewith honour god man promot tree 910 tree said fig tree come reign 911 fig tree said forsak sweet good fruit promot tree 912 said tree vine come reign 913 vine said leav wine cheereth god man promot tree 914 said tree brambl come reign 915 brambl said tree truth anoint king come put trust shadow let fire come brambl devour cedar lebanon 916 now done truli sincer made abimelech king dealt jerubba hous done accord deserv hand 917 father fought adventur life deliv hand midian 918 are risen father’ hous day slain son threescor ten person stone made abimelech son maidserv king men shechem is brother 919 dealt truli sincer jerubba hous day rejoic abimelech let also rejoic 920 let fire come abimelech devour men shechem hous millo let fire come men shechem hous millo devour abimelech 921 jotham ran fled went beer dwelt fear abimelech brother 922 abimelech had reign three year israel 923 god sent evil spirit abimelech men shechem men shechem dealt treacher abimelech 924 cruelti done threescor ten son jerubba might come blood laid abimelech brother slew men shechem aid kill brethren 925 men shechem set lier wait top mountain rob came way wa told abimelech 926 gaal son ebe came brethren went shechem men shechem put confid 927 went field gather vineyard trode grape made merri went hous god did eat drink curs abimelech 928 gaal son ebe said is abimelech is shechem serv is son jerubba zebul offic serv men hamor father shechem serv 929 would god peopl were hand would remov abimelech said abimelech increas armi come 930 zebul ruler citi heard word gaal son ebe anger wa kindl 931 sent messeng abimelech privili say behold gaal son ebe brethren come shechem behold fortifi citi thee 932 now night peopl is thee lie wait field 933 shall morn soon sun is shalt rise earli set citi behold peopl is come thee mayest shalt find occas 934 abimelech rose peopl were night laid wait shechem four compani 935 gaal son ebe went stood enter gate citi abimelech rose peopl were lie wait 936 gaal saw peopl said zebul behold come peopl top mountain zebul said seest shadow mountain were men 937 gaal spake again said see come peopl middl land compani come plain meonenim 938 said zebul is now thi mouth wherewith saidst is abimelech serv is peopl hast despis pray now fight 939 gaal went men shechem fought abimelech were grown would stay have husband nay daughter grieveth much sake hand lord is gone 114 lift voic wept again orpah kiss mother law ruth clave 115 said behold thi sister law is gone peopl god return thi sister law 116 ruth said intreat leav thee return follow thee whither goest will lodgest will lodg thi peopl shall peopl thi god god 117 diest will die will buri lord more also ought death part wa found 1323 garrison philistin went passag michmash 141 now came pass day jonathan son saul said young man bare armour come let philistines’ garrison is side told father 142 saul tarri uttermost part gibeah pomegran tree is migron peopl were were six hundr men 143 ahiah son ahitub ichabod’ brother son phineha son eli lord’ priest shiloh wear ephod peopl knew jonathan wa gone 144 passag wa veri great discomfitur 1421 hebrew were philistin time went camp countri even also turn israelit were saul jonathan 1422 likewis men israel had hid mount ephraim heard philistin fled even also follow hard battl 1423 lord save israel day battl pass bethaven 1424 men israel were distress day saul had adjur peopl say curs man eateth food even may aveng mine enemi none peopl tast food 1425 land came wood wa honey ground 1426 peopl were come wood behold honey drop man put hand mouth peopl fear oath 1427 jonathan heard father charg peopl oath put forth end rod wa hand dip honeycomb put hand mouth eye were enlighten 1428 answer peopl said thi father straitli charg peopl oath say curs man eateth food day peopl were faint 1429 said jonathan father hath troubl land see pray mine eye been enlighten tast littl honey 1430 much more hapli peopl had eaten freeli day spoil enemi found had been now much greater slaughter philistin 1431 smote philistin day michmash aijalon peopl were veri faint 1432 peopl flew spoil took sheep oxen calv slew ground peopl did eat blood 1433 told saul say behold peopl sin lord eat blood said transgress roll great stone day 1434 saul said dispers peopl say bring hither man ox man sheep slay here eat sin lord eat blood peopl brought man ox night slew 1435 saul built altar lord same wa first altar built lord 1436 saul said let philistin night spoil morn light let leav man said seemeth good thee said priest let draw hither god 1437 saul ask counsel god shall philistin wilt deliv hand israel answer day 1438 saul said draw hither chief peopl know see wherein sin hath been day 1439 lord liveth saveth israel jonathan son shall sure die wa man peopl answer 1440 said israel side jonathan son will side peopl said saul seemeth good thee 1441 saul said lord god israel give perfect lot saul jonathan were taken peopl escap 1442 saul said cast lot jonathan son jonathan wa taken 1443 saul said jonathan tell hast done jonathan told said did tast littl honey end rod wa mine hand lo must die 1444 saul answer god more also shalt sure die jonathan 1445 peopl said saul shall jonathan die hath wrought great salvat israel god forbid lord liveth shall hair head fall ground hath wrought god day peopl rescu jonathan die 1446 saul went follow philistin philistin went own place 1447 saul took kingdom israel fought enemi side moab children ammon son ahitub ahimelech son abiathar were priest seraiah wa scribe 818 benaiah son jehoiada wa cherethit pelethit david’ son were chief ruler 91 david said is is left hous saul may shew kind jonathan’ sake 92 wa hous saul servant name wa ziba had call david king said art ziba said thi servant is 93 king said is hous saul may shew kind god ziba said king jonathan hath son is lame feet 94 king said is ziba said king behold is hous machir son ammiel lodebar 95 king david sent fetch hous machir son ammiel lodebar 96 now mephibosheth son jonathan son saul wa come david fell face did rever david said mephibosheth answer behold thi servant 97 david said fear will sure shew thee kind jonathan thi father’ sake will restor thee land saul thi father shalt eat bread tabl continu 98 bow said is thi servant shouldest look such dead dog am 99 king call ziba saul’ servant said given thi master’ son pertain saul hous 910 thi son thi servant shall land shalt bring fruit thi master’ son may food eat mephibosheth thi master’ son shall eat bread alway tabl now ziba had fifteen son twenti servant 911 said ziba king accord lord king hath command servant shall thi servant mephibosheth said king shall eat tabl king’ son 912 mephibosheth had young son name wa micha dwelt hous ziba were servant mephibosheth 913 mephibosheth dwelt jerusalem did eat continu king’ tabl wa lame feet 101 came pass king children ammon die hanun son reign stead 102 said david will shew kind hanun son nahash father shew kind david sent comfort hand servant father david’ servant came land children ammon 103 princ children ammon said hanun lord thinkest david doth honour thi father hath sent comfort thee hath david sent servant thee search citi spi overthrow 104 hanun took david’ servant shave beard cut garment middl even buttock sent 105 told david sent meet men were greatli asham king said tarri jericho beard grown return 106 children ammon saw stank david children ammon sent hire syrian bethrehob syrian zoba twenti thousand footmen king maacah thousand men ishtob twelv thousand men 107 david heard sent joab host mighti men 108 children ammon came put battl array enter gate syrian zoba rehob ishtob maacah were field 109 joab saw front battl wa chose choic men israel put array syrian 1010 rest peopl deliv hand abishai brother might put array children ammon 1011 said syrian too strong shalt help joab servant israel destroy children ammon besieg rabbah david tarri still jerusalem 112 came pass eveningtid david aros bed walk roof king’ hous roof saw woman wash woman wa veri beauti look 113 firstborn set gate thereof youngest son segub accord word lord spake joshua son nun 171 elijah tishbit wa inhabit gilead said ahab lord god israel liveth stand shall dew rain year accord word 172 word lord came say 173 get thee henc turn thee eastward hide thyself brook cherith is jordan 174 shall shalt drink brook command raven feed thee 175 went did accord word lord went dwelt brook cherith is jordan 176 raven brought bread flesh morn bread flesh even drank brook 177 came pass brook dri had been rain land 178 word lord came say 179 aris get thee zarephath belongeth zidon dwell behold command widow woman sustain thee 1710 aros went zarephath came gate citi behold widow woman wa gather stick call said fetch pray thee littl water vessel may drink 1711 wa go fetch call said bring pray thee morsel bread hand 1712 said lord thi god liveth cake hand meal barrel littl oil cruse behold am gather two stick may dress son may eat die 1713 elijah said fear hast said make thereof littl cake first bring make thee thi son 1714 thu saith lord god israel barrel meal shall wast shall cruse oil fail day lord sendeth rain earth 1715 went did accord say elijah hous did eat mani day 1716 barrel meal wast did cruse oil fail accord word lord spake elijah 1717 came pass thing son woman mistress hous fell sick sick wa sore wa breath left 1718 said elijah thee man god art come call sin remembr slay son 1719 said give thi son took bosom carri loft abod laid own bed 1720 cri lord said lord god hast also brought evil widow sojourn slay son 1721 stretch child three time cri lord said lord god pray thee let child’ soul come again 1722 lord heard voic elijah soul child came again reviv 1723 elijah took child brought chamber hous deliv mother elijah said see thi son liveth 1724 woman said elijah now know art man god word lord thi mouth is truth 181 came pass mani day word lord came elijah third year say shew thyself ahab will send rain earth 182 elijah went shew ahab wa sore famin samaria 183 ahab call obadiah wa governor hous now obadiah fear lord greatli 184 wa jezebel cut prophet lord obadiah took hundr prophet hid fifti cave fed bread water 185 ahab said obadiah land fountain water brook peradventur may find grass save hors mule aliv lose beast 186 divid land pass ahab went way obadiah went way 187 obadiah wa way behold elijah met knew fell face said art lord elijah 188 answer am tell thi lord behold elijah is here 189 said sin wouldest deliv thi servant hand ahab slay 1810 lord thi god liveth is nation kingdom whither lord hath sent seek thee said is took oath kingdom nation found thee 1811 now sayest tell thi lord behold elijah is here 1812 shall come pass soon am gone thee spirit lord shall carri thee whither know come tell ahab cannot find thee shall slay thi servant fear lord youth 1813 wa told lord did jezebel slew prophet lord hid hundr men lord’ prophet fifti cave fed bread water 1814 now sayest tell thi lord behold elijah is here shall slay 1815 elijah said lord host liveth stand will sure shew day 1816 obadiah went meet ahab told ahab went meet elijah 1817 came pass ahab saw elijah ahab said art troubleth israel 1818 answer troubl israel thi father’ hous forsaken command lord hast follow baalim 1819 now send gather israel mount carmel prophet baal four hundr fifti prophet grove four hundr eat jezebel’ tabl 1820 ahab sent children israel gather prophet mount carmel 1821 elijah came peopl said long halt two opinion lord god follow baal follow peopl answer word 1822 said elijah peopl even remain prophet lord baal’ prophet are four hundr fifti men 1823 let give two bullock let choos bullock cut piec lay wood put fire will dress bullock lay wood put fire 1824 call name god will call name lord god answereth fire let god peopl answer said is spoken 1825 elijah said prophet baal choos bullock dress first are mani call name god put fire 1826 took bullock wa given dress call name baal morn even noon say baal hear wa voic answer leap altar wa made 1827 came pass noon elijah mock said cri aloud is god is talk is pursu is journey peradventur sleepeth must awak 1828 cri aloud cut manner knive lancet blood gush own land 41 now cri certain woman wive son prophet elisha say thi servant husband is dead knowest thi servant did fear lord creditor is come take two son bondmen 42 elisha said shall thee tell hast hous said handmaid hath thing hous save pot oil 43 said borrow thee vessel abroad thi neighbour even empti vessel borrow few 44 art come shalt shut door thee thi son shalt pour vessel shalt set is full 45 went shut door son brought vessel pour 46 came pass vessel were full said son bring vessel said is vessel more oil stay 47 came told man god said sell oil pay thi debt live thi children rest 48 fell day elisha pass shunem wa great woman constrain eat bread wa oft pass turn thither eat bread 49 said husband behold now perceiv is holi man god passeth continu 410 let make littl chamber pray thee wall let set bed tabl stool candlestick shall cometh shall turn thither 411 fell day came thither turn chamber lay 412 said gehazi servant call shunammit had call stood 413 said say now behold hast been care care is done thee wouldest spoken king captain host answer dwell mine own peopl 414 said is done gehazi answer verili hath child husband is old 415 said call had call stood door 416 said season accord time life shalt embrac son said nay lord man god lie handmaid 417 woman conceiv bare son season elisha had said accord time life 418 child wa grown fell day went father reaper 419 said father head head said lad carri mother 420 had taken brought mother sat knee noon die 421 went laid bed man god shut door went 422 call husband said send pray thee young men ass may run man god come again 423 said wilt day is new moon sabbath said shall 424 saddl ass said servant drive forward slack thi ride bid thee 425 went came man god mount carmel came pass man god saw afar said gehazi call gehazi said call shunammit call wa come said take thi son 437 went fell feet bow ground took son went 438 elisha came again gilgal wa dearth land son prophet were sit said servant set great pot seeth pottag son prophet 439 went field gather herb found wild vine gather thereof wild gourd lap full came shred pot pottag knew 440 pour men eat came pass were eat pottag cri said man god is death pot could eat thereof 441 said bring meal cast pot said pour peopl may eat wa harm pot 442 came man baalshalisha brought man god bread firstfruit twenti loav barley full ear corn husk thereof said give peopl may eat 443 servitor said set hundr men said again give peopl may eat thu saith lord shall eat shall leav thereof 444 set did eat left thereof accord word lord 51 now naaman captain host king syria wa great man master honour lord had given deliver syria wa also mighti man valour wa leper 52 syrian had gone compani had brought captiv land israel littl maid wait naaman’ wife 53 said mistress would god lord were prophet is samaria would recov leprosi 54 went told lord say thu thu said maid is land israel 55 king syria said will send letter king israel depart took ten talent silver six thousand piec gold ten chang raiment 56 brought letter king israel say now letter is come thee behold therewith sent naaman servant thee mayest recov leprosi 57 came pass king israel had read letter rent cloth said am god kill make aliv man doth send recov man leprosi consid pray see seeketh quarrel 58 wa elisha man god had heard king israel had rent cloth sent king say hast rent thi cloth let come now shall know is prophet israel 59 naaman came hors chariot stood door hous elisha 510 elisha sent messeng say wash jordan seven time thi flesh shall come again thee shalt clean 511 naaman wa wroth went said behold thought will sure come stand call name lord god strike hand place recov leper 512 are abana pharpar river damascu better water israel may wash clean turn went rage 513 servant came spake said father prophet had bid thee great thing wouldest done much saith thee wash clean 514 went dip seven time jordan accord say man god flesh came again flesh littl child wa clean 515 return man god compani came stood said behold now know is god earth israel now pray thee take bless thi servant 516 said lord liveth stand will receiv none urg take refus 517 naaman said shall pray thee given thi servant two mules’ burden earth thi servant will henceforth offer burnt offer sacrific god lord 518 thing lord pardon thi servant master goeth hous rimmon worship leaneth hand bow hous rimmon bow hous rimmon lord pardon thi servant thing 519 said peac depart littl way 520 gehazi servant elisha man god said behold master hath spare naaman syrian receiv hand brought lord liveth will run take somewhat 521 gehazi follow naaman naaman saw run light chariot meet said is 522 said is master hath sent say behold even now come mount ephraim two young men son prophet give pray thee talent silver two chang garment 523 naaman said content take two talent urg bound two talent silver two bag two chang garment laid two servant bare 524 came tower took hand bestow hous let men depart 525 went stood master elisha said whenc comest gehazi said thi servant went whither 526 said went mine heart thee man turn again chariot meet thee is time receiv money receiv garment oliveyard vineyard sheep oxen menserv maidserv 527 leprosi naaman shall cleav thee thi seed went presenc leper white snow 61 son prophet said elisha behold now place dwell thee is too strait 62 let pray thee jordan take thenc man beam let make place may dwell answer 63 said content pray thee thi servant answer will 64 went came jordan cut wood 65 wa fell beam axe head fell water cri said master wa borrow 66 man god said fell shew place cut stick cast thither iron did swim 67 said take thee put hand took 68 king syria war israel took counsel servant say such such place shall camp 69 man god sent king israel say bewar pass such place thither syrian are come 610 king israel sent place man god told warn save twice 611 heart king syria wa sore troubl thing call servant said will shew is king israel 612 servant said none lord king elisha prophet is israel telleth king israel word speakest thi bedchamb 613 said spi is may send fetch wa told say behold is dothan 614 sent thither hors chariot great host came night compass citi 615 servant man god wa risen earli gone forth behold host compass citi hors chariot servant said master shall 616 answer fear are more 617 elisha pray said lord pray thee open eye may see lord open eye young man saw behold mountain wa full hors chariot fire elisha 618 came elisha pray lord said smite peopl pray thee blind smote blind accord word elisha 619 elisha said is way is citi follow will bring man seek led samaria 620 came pass were come samaria elisha said lord open eye men may see lord open eye saw behold were midst samaria 621 king israel said elisha saw father shall smite shall smite 622 answer shalt smite wouldest smite hast taken captiv thi sword thi bow set bread water may eat drink master 623 prepar great provis had eaten drunk sent went master band syria came more land israel 624 came pass benhadad king syria gather host went besieg samaria 625 wa great famin samaria behold besieg ass’ head wa sold fourscor piec silver fourth part cab dove’ dung five piec silver 626 king israel wa pass wall cri woman say help lord king 627 said lord help thee whenc shall help thee barnfloor winepress 628 king said aileth thee answer woman said give thi son may eat day will eat son morrow 629 boil son did eat said day give thi son may eat hath hid son 630 came pass king heard word woman rent cloth pass wall peopl look behold had sackcloth flesh 631 said god more also head elisha son shaphat shall stand day 632 elisha sat hous elder sat king sent man ere messeng came said elder see son murder hath sent take mine head look messeng cometh shut door hold fast door is sound master’ feet 633 talk behold messeng came said behold evil is lord wait lord longer 71 elisha said hear word lord thu saith lord morrow time shall measur fine flour sold shekel two measur barley shekel gate samaria 72 lord hand king lean answer man god said behold lord would make window heaven might thing said behold shalt see eye shalt eat thereof 73 were four leprou men enter gate said sit here die 74 say will enter citi famin is citi shall die sit still here die also now come let fall host syrian save aliv shall live kill shall die 75 rose twilight camp syrian were come uttermost part camp syria behold wa man 76 lord had made host syrian hear nois chariot nois hors even nois great host said lo king israel hath hire king hittit king egyptian come 77 aros fled twilight left tent hors ass even camp wa fled life 78 leper came uttermost part camp went tent did eat drink carri thenc silver gold raiment went hid came again enter tent carri thenc also went hid 79 said day is day good tide hold peac tarri morn light mischief will come now come may tell king’ household 710 came call porter citi told say came camp syrian behold wa man voic man hors tie ass tie tent were 711 call porter told king’ hous 712 king aros night said servant will now shew syrian done know hungri are gone camp hide field say come citi shall catch aliv get citi 713 servant answer said let take pray thee five hors remain are left citi behold are multitud israel are left behold say are even multitud israelit are consum let send see 714 took two chariot hors king sent host syrian say see 715 went jordan lo way wa full garment vessel syrian had cast hast messeng return told king 716 peopl went spoil tent syrian measur fine flour wa sold shekel two measur barley shekel accord drunken sorrow cup astonish desol cup thi sister samaria 2334 shalt even drink suck shalt break sherd thereof pluck own breast spoken saith lord god 2335 thu saith lord god hast forgotten cast thi bear also thi lewd thi whoredom 2336 lord said son man wilt judg aholah aholibah declar abomin 2337 commit adulteri blood is hand idol commit adulteri also caus son bare pass fire devour 2338 done defil sanctuari same day profan sabbath 2339 had slain children idol came same day sanctuari profan lo thu done midst mine hous 2340 furthermor sent men come messeng wa sent lo came didst wash thyself paintedst thi eye deckedst thyself ornament 2341 satest state bed tabl prepar hast set mine incens mine oil 2342 voic multitud be eas wa men common sort were brought sabean wilder put bracelet hand
